name: One million Neopoints!
description:
This is one million neopoints!
Ever thought you could never save enough money for that awesome paintbrush you always wanted? Well now you can! Impress your friends by buying one million neopoints!

This is five-hundred-thousand neopoints! Ever thought you could never save enough money for that awesome item that you always wanted? Well now you can! See what it’s like to be a big spender in neopia!  You can also buy this and put it in your bank so you can collect the interest on it.

This is two-hundred-fifty-thousand nepoints! Ever thought you could never save enough money so that you can restock items you’ve always wanted? Too lazy to play games? Well now you don’t have to! Impress your friends by buying 250,000!
